abstract: To commemorate World Humanitarian Day, the United Nations is encouraging people to declare via social media that they will do something to help another person.
snippet: To commemorate World Humanitarian Day, the United Nations is encouraging people to declare via social media that they will do something to help another person.
lead_paragraph: Is one weekend enough time to mobilize an additional 750 million people to do something meaningful? Perhaps, if you combine celebrity power, huge global brands and a humanitarian message from the United Nations.

headline.main: United Nations Is Looking to Spur a Billion People to Act
